channel.title: CVE Feed for AlgolPlus -- Advanced Dynamic Pricing for WooCommerce (WordPress plugin)

item.title: CVE-2022-43488|2024-09-16T18:50:15.965Z -- algolplus -- advanced%20dynamic%20pricing%20for%20woocommerce%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Advanced Dynamic Pricing for WooCommerce plugin <= 4.1.5 on WordPress leading to rule type migration.
